version_description:
Following your feedback we are pleased to offer new features :

- New Easy Mode with 10 credits! (leaderboards disabled)
- New touch speed options for a better control : Fast Touch 120%, Fast Touch 150%, Fast Touch 200%!!

If you are happy with the new features please review the game and share the news!

The DotEmu team.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Various bug fixes
- Add Chinese localisation
